1122.content:
Leah has always been a huge pain in the ass for her teachers at West View High. She was brilliantly smart, and barely needed to pay attention in class to get A's. But because she didn't need to pay attention, she frequently got bored in class, which often resulted in her acting out. She loved to point out her teacher's mistakes, and because she was also beautiful, the whole class paid more attention to her and her antics than to the lesson at hand. Detention didn't work, as she'd just do the same things there, just on the teachers' personal time after school. Most teachers gave up punishing her, since it didn't work, and instead tried to find ways to keep Leah occupied so she wouldn't negative affect other students' education.

But with the new law passed, that was about to change. Mr. Laning, Leah's algebra professor, decided he had enough. Since all other forms of punishment were useless, maybe humiliation would finally get the blonde to stop being such a troublemaker.

It all started in algebra class, when Leah started throwing paper balls at Mr. Laning's back while he tried to write an equation on the board. His patience already running thin, the teacher turned around and calmly asked the blonde to cut it out.

"What was that, Arthur? What makes you think I'll listen now? You can't do shit to me." Leah taunted the man. Mr. Laning was going to let it go, but she disrespected him by addressing him using his first name and blatantly disregarded his polite request. Now pissed, Mr. Laning wasn't going to hold back anymore.

"That's it, young lady, I've had it with your disrespectful behavior! Now you've done it." Mr Laning barked.

Leah snickered. "Oh yeah? What're you going to do about it?"

Mr. Laning simply smiled. "Are you aware of the law that was passed last week? The one giving authority figures almost unlimited power in administering punishments?"

Leah shook her head 'no'.

"Well, it allows me to administer any punishment that doesn't result in physical harm. And as far as I know, 'humiliation' is not a physically harmful punishment."

Leah was now a bit nervous. "...humiliation?"

"That's right. And you know what one of the most humiliating things for any teenage girl is?"

"What?" Leah asked nervously.

"Exposure."

Leah didn't respond.

"And with that, Leah, I kindly ask that you remove...

11223.content:
"You...you can't ask me to do that," Leah stuttered, trying to remain defiant.

"I can and I will," Mr. Laning replied smugly. "Now, your choice is a simple one. Remove your blouse and bra, or have it removed for you. Which will it be?"

The class watched her silently until her cleavage was fully exposed, than one of the football players let out an "Oh Yeah!" The offending young man was quickly silence by a glare from Mr. Laning, and the rest of the class watched in silent expectation as Leah removed her blouse entirely.

Leah finally unbuttoned her blouse and, with her head bowed, slid it off her body. She exposed a very firm torso, with a flat (but not overly defined stomach) and a very prominent bust line contained by a white bra with a little lace. Even Mr. Laning found himself both impressed and aroused by the sigh of Leah's bra contained breasts.

"Do I have to take my bra off too?" Leah asked pleadingly as she looked back up. "I've learned my lesson, really I have."

Mr. Laning found himself unable to talk. After he cleared his throat a couple of times, he finally asked, "So what size bra do you wear, Leah?"

Bowing her head in embarrassment, Leah whispered, "Thirty eight double dee." One of the students let out a whistle, and this time Mr. Laning didn't admonish anyone.

"So can I keep my bra on?" Leah asked hopefully as she looked back up.

Does Mr. Laning let Leah keep her bra on?

1122311.content:
"You can keep your bra on," Mr. Laning relents, much to the disappointment of the male students. "But we will have a discussion after class."

Leah breathes a sigh of relief, and is probably the most attentive she has ever in any of her classes, much less Mr. Laning's. She catches more than one boy staring at her bra clad breasts. She tries to console herself that she's shown more in a bikini at the beach, but she's still pretty embarrassed. Finally, class is over and everyone but her and Mr; Laning shuffled out.

1122311.title: Yes

Leah hurriedly put her blouse back on, thanking Mr. Laning profusely, and promising to turn over a new leaf.

True to her word, Leah was never disruptive in class again. And the tale of her having to go shirtless served as a cautionary tale to the other students in her school, reducing disciplinary problems drastically.

"A price?" Leah asked hopefully. She suspected that Mr. Laning was going to make her promise to be a better student of something. At this point, she would readily agree. And she would mean it sincerely too. She never wanted another morning like this again!

"Yes, a price," Mr. Laning repeated. "In return for letting you leave this classroom with your blouse on, you will take your bra off for me now. And..." Mr. Laning added, staring straight at her breasts, "You will let me feel them."

1142.content:
"This can't be happening!" thought Erica, a blonde teenager girl who time and genes didn't help her. Why am I telling you this? Because today she was going to experience a change in her life.

Let's go back in time to understand this, Erica, has a complex with her body. She wanted to prove that she was more mature, her conclusion? steal a beer from a mini market, she was caught when the beer slipped from her blouse and broke on the ground. The employees saw a devastated and scared girl after this, so they simply called her parents.

However, Erica's mother was in a different mood than theirs. "What's the deal with you?"

"Nothing." She replied. "I just wanted to be mature." Erica was more relieved that the police wasn't involved.

"Yeah, trying to steal a beer is really adult matters." Erica's mom sighed. "I guess I have no choice." she thought.

Later in their house.

"Erica, I need to talk with you." said Erica's mom.

"What now?"

"You have been lately, so obsessed about this maturity of yours and causing too much trouble that I think it's time for a punishment." Erica did not respond.

"I sign you to do community service and a friend of mine has a vacancy in her store, so I proposed you, this can be useful since you want to start acting as an adult." Her mother said.

Erica wasn't happy, but maybe this could help her, she was about to leave the living room when suddenly.

"Where are going?" Her mom asks.

"To my room, I thought you were done."

"What are you talking about? I haven't mentioned your punishment yet." Erica was confused about this, so her mom continued. "And for your punishment, I need your clothes in here." she points to the table of the living room.

She just giggled, but her mother wasn't kidding and she noticed it.

Erica frowned. "Oh, you want it? Here." She takes off her blouse, revealing she wasn't wearing a bra, but why she should? After all, she had a flat chest. "And these ones, too." She pulls down her pants, underwear included and she stands naked in front of her mother, showing her crotch with no signs that pubic hair has ever grown in there. "You can keep it, I have more in my room." She crosses her arms.

"And you still don't get it, huh." Erica's mom smiles, tired of her daughter throwing tantrums. "Your punishment is that you aren't allowed to wear clothes anymore, here is a copy of the format I sent to the city hall. And be prepared, you are the first person in the city to be punished like this." She leaves the piece of paper on the table and goes to her bedroom.

Erica went pale after hearing this and just thought: "This can't be happening!"

For the most, Ayami tried not to attract attention, or get into trouble. In the latter department, she was very successful, as she was a quiet, well-mannered student who only occasionally caused a disruption in class because of an accidentally mischosen word, which would get loud laughter and cause Ayami to turn beet red.

But when it came to not attracting attention, Ayami failed miserable. She was a very beautiful young woman, and her waist length dark, straight silken hair that stretched down to her waist only accentuated her exotic beauty. She always wore baggy clothes and kept her head bowed, but even under all her shapeless clothing, people still knew that a fit, trim body with a 32DD rack (made even more impressive because it was on a five foot tall frame) laid underneath.

114321.content:
On one hand, Ayami loved her Honors Physics class. It was a small class, just six students, including herself. Her teacher, Mr. Campbell, was fairly youngish, having only recently graduated from college himself, but he was very knowledgeable on the subjects he taught, and very enthusiastic. And even though this was an Honors class, Mr. Campbell was not above using practical and entertaining demonstrations on some subjects.

In addition, all the students were very enthusiastic about the subject. And since it was a scientific subject, Ayami found that rarely was she presented the opportunity to embarrass herself on a poor choice of words in English.

The downsize in Ayami's eyes was that she was the only girl, and the only non-white, in the class. Granted, it wasn't like she was in a class full of crude gigantic football players pumped up with hormones. These were nice, well-mannered intellectually curious young men who were always polite with her and even occasionally joked with her. And they were all not bad looking. And it was a good group. Mr. Campbell was young enough that he could have passed for any of the guys' older brother, and the classroom was more camaraderie rather than strict academic discipline.

But they were still guys, and she caught them more than once "checking her out." Even Mr. Campbell would surreptitiously size her up.

122.content:
All things considered, Jamat would have just preferred to stay home and get her high school degree online. She hated high school. The kids were always staring at her because of her conservative clothing, and the way she always wore her hair in what they called an old librarian's bun. And even though she wore loose clothing and moved about scrunched up, all the students (and more than a few teachers) were quite aware of her large, firm chest (to Jamat's shame, she wore a 34DD bra and, when it was off, which was only at home in the shower, there was absolutely no sag in her breasts).

She tried to explain her discomfort to her parents, but they were oblivious. They had moved to this new country and expected ALL their children, including Jamat, to adapt to the western ways. While maintain proper modesty, of course.

Jamat was very much aware when the new law was passed, but she was never a disciplinary problem at school. And as graduation approached, she felt her daily dose of discomfort was going to soon come to an end.

How wrong Jamat was going to be proven wrong.

Jamat's humiliation at high school would begin
122.title: Jamat Abidi

1222.content:
The only class Jamat felt comfortable in was her math class. True, she was the only nonwhite young woman in a small class of eighteen year old white guys, but there were a number of reasons for her to still like it.

First of all, the class only had eight students, including herself. The class took up two slots, and was followed by her study hall slot, which she could (and did) take in the same classroom as her math class.

Mr. Whiting, her math teacher, kept a minifridge behind his desk. So his students could bring their lunches in, put them in the fridge, and have lunch in his classroom. Which Jamat did.

Jamat also had qualified to take the rest of her classes virtually for the remainder of the year. So Jamat could come to school, stay in one class room, and then go home.

Mr. Whiting was a great teacher, and very helpful to all his students. And yes, she did catch the guys staring at her bustline from time to time, but the guys were shy, and turned away if she caught them staring. And they were generally nice guys.

So, except for running the gamut of stares, leers and occasional catcalls entering and exiting the school, Jamut found her time at school not so bad.

Then one day, things took a turn.

Mr. Jonathan Whiting was a twenty-seven year old instructor with a lanky build, sandy hair, a light beard and a year round seasonal tan who was working on his doctorate as he taught math. To keep in shape, Mr. Whiting enjoys rowing. He is a jovial man who loves teaching.

Daniel Fields was five foot nine and enjoyed adventure racing and had dreams of being on American Ninja or a similar program. He tended to be soft spoken but amiable

Back to the story

Jamat always caught a ride home with Lance. She was very quiet on the ride home, mainly because Daniel was even shyer than her, and she did not want to distract him.

So all Jamat had to do was arrive on time.

Unfortunately, Jamat's mother was always late. So Jamat always arrived five to ten minutes late for the special Saturday session. And no matter how much she tried, Jamat just couldn't get her mother to be more timely.

info.brief_description: Unlucky girls get punished with nudity after breaking the rules
info.description:
A new law is passed that allows much more freedom for anyone in a position of authority (parents, teachers/principals, bosses, etc.) to punish those beneath them. The only restriction is that the punishment cannot do physical harm to the person being punished. Pretty much everything else is fair game, including nudity.

This story takes place in modern times, and this new law is only a month old. Whoever the protagonist is will be the first in their community to be punished with nudity.

Rules:
1) This is an ENF story only. No other fetishes allowed (diapers, scat, anything sci-fi, etc.).
2) No violence or rape. Groping is allowed, but anything further is not.
3) Keep storylines fresh, don't just have her be naked all the time with nothing else interesting happening. This one can be difficult to follow without breaking other rules, so this "rule" is more of a guideline than a hard rule.
4) Try to have good grammar and spelling.
